sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const TrainersSection: React.FC = () => { const trainers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Gaurav Tevathiya', role: 'Founder & Lead Trainer', company: 'Cloud Blogger', experience: '10+ years', expertise: ['Azure', 'AWS', 'Google Cloud', 'DevOps', 'AI', 'Automation'], image: '👨‍💻', bio: 'DevOps enthusiast and cloud expert. Has tutored 1000+ students. Passionate about teaching and helping students transition into tech careers.', linkedin: '#', github: '#', youtube: '#' }, { id: 2, name: 'Salman', role: 'Senior DevOps Trainer', company: 'Cloud Blogger', experience: '5+ year experience', post: 'Technical Community Manager', expertise: ['Azure', 'DevOps', 'CI/CD', 'Monitoring', 'Cloud Security', 'Scripting'], image: '👩‍🔧', bio: 'Microsoft certified professional with expertise in Azure cloud services and DevOps practices. Dedicated to making complex concepts simple.', linkedin: '#', github: '#', youtube: '#' }, { id: 3, name: 'Sasmit Yadav', role: 'Infrastructure Specialist', company: 'Cloud Blogger', experience: '1+ year experience', post: 'Developer Advocate', expertise: ['C++', 'Azure AI Service', 'Node.js', 'Python'], image: '👨‍🏭', bio: 'Infrastructure expert with deep knowledge of Linux systems and monitoring tools. Loves helping students build practical skills.', linkedin: '#', github: '#', youtube: '#' } ]; return (
{/* Section Header */}

Meet Our
Expert Trainers

Our passionate team of DevOps professionals is dedicated to helping you succeed in your tech career journey.

{/* Trainers Grid */}
{trainers.map((trainer) => (
{/* Trainer Header */}
{trainer.image}

{trainer.name}

{trainer.role}

{trainer.company}

{/* Experience */}
{trainer.experience}
{/* Bio */}

{trainer.bio}

{/* Expertise */}

Expertise

{trainer.expertise.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* Social Links */}
))}
{/* CTA */}

Ready to Start Your Journey?

Join our growing community and learn from passionate DevOps professionals who care about your success.

); }; export default TrainersSection;
